CustomField.description: Indicates whether the submitted value is within the characters limit so it can be synced to NetSuite
CustomField.formula: IF( ISBLANK( VAT_Number__c ) || ISBLANK( Account__r.VAT_number__c ), "", IF( LEN (VAT_Number__c) <= 20, IMAGE("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=0150P000005PRdt","YES"), IMAGE("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=0150P000005PRcW", "NO") ) )
CustomField.label: Length? - VAT number
